patthana8.17:1.1_0: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati
patthana8.17:1.1_1: hetupaccayā. Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo
patthana8.17:1.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ceva
patthana8.17:1.1_3: naanāsavo ca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.17:2.1_0: Naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo
patthana8.17:2.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva
patthana8.17:2.1_2: naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana8.17:2.1_3: paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.17:3.1_0: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naanāsavañceva nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva
patthana8.17:3.1_1: naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naanāsavañceva
patthana8.17:3.1_2: nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.17:3.1_3: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naanāsavañceva nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva
patthana8.17:3.1_4: naanāsavo ca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.17:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
